artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige; Publisher: Sanoya Kihei
description: half page; landscape with figures standing and resting on and near rocks in foreground center; mountain peak at center background; tall tree at left; from accordion-folded album with black soft cover
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Thirty-six Views of Mount Fuji (Fuji sanjūrokkei 不二三十六景)
title: Chiyogasaki, Meguro in Edo from the series "36 Views of Mt. Fuji"
